name: Open-Source Contribution: Spinning Text Component
description: Contributed to the Motion Primitives open-source animation library by creating a customizable spinning text component.
contributions: Designed a reusable spinning text component with options for customization. Added documentation and examples to facilitate easy adoption by other developers.

name: UI for Online E-Shop
description: Designed a sleek and responsive user interface for an online e-shop, elevating the shopping experience with modern aesthetics and smooth interactions.
contributions: Created an engaging UI from scratch, including reusable React components and responsive layouts. Implemented animations using Framer Motion to enhance interactivity.

name: E-commerce Project (MERN Stack)
description: Developed a comprehensive e-commerce platform with a focus on branding, copywriting, and a full-stack admin dashboard.
contributions: Led the entire project lifecycle, including design, development, and branding. Built a responsive user interface and a fully functional admin dashboard using the MERN stack.

name: Full-stack Dashboard in Next.js
description: Built a full-stack dashboard application using Next.js, incorporating TypeScript for strong typing and PostgreSQL for backend data management.
contributions: Implemented secure authentication with NextAuth and developed a dynamic, responsive UI. Leveraged TypeScript to ensure code quality and maintainability.

name: Countries API Explorer
description: Created a web application that allows users to search and explore country data using the REST Countries API.
contributions: Implemented search, filter, and detailed view functionalities for countries. Enhanced user experience with a clean and accessible design.

name: Calculator App with Theme Switcher
description: Built a fully functional calculator app with a theme switcher, offering users the ability to perform basic operations and toggle between themes.
contributions: Developed the calculator logic and UI using ES6 JavaScript. Designed the layout with CSS Grid and added a theme-switching feature for user customization.

name: E-commerce Product Details
description: Developed a product detail page for an e-commerce platform, featuring a lightbox gallery and a cart functionality.
contributions: Implemented real-time cart updates, a responsive lightbox gallery, and detailed product information display.
